amendment.description: To clarify United States policy in order to deter nuclear testing by foreign governments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5169 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 5169 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Obama. (consideration: CR S10985; text: CR S10985) To clarify United States policy in order to deter nuclear testing by foreign governments.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5169 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Obama.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5169 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
